@ EVERYONE complaining or asking for it to be smaller in size.

Oh my FUCKING god. This is a video game in the HD era. 

The average HD game is between 5-12 GB, if you want it to work right.

it takes maybe 4 hours to download 12gb on a non-shit internet connection.

And the fact that THIS (again 5-12 is normal) is a mere 3.9 gigs, what the fuck do you want?

I assume it's either a shitty, faulty game so you can complain more, or either a game you can fit on a fucking GameBoy.

Quit complaining that it wont fit in a mini micro cheap ass flash drive that barely holds anything, and buy internet that works.

If your internet doesn't work well, what the fuck you doing downloading next gen games for? And complaining?

Check your net douches.
